channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for KY
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for KY

item.title: Report E-2024050520
item.description:
Report E-2024050520

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-24T15:13:39+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-22
  • City: LOUISVILLE
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: DAYTON FREIGHT LINES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Dayton Freight personnel observed approximately five (5) gallons of material impacting the trailer floor. The released material released from one (1) 50-gallon metal drum. Dayton Freight personnel cleaned the impacted area and containerized the spent material into one (1) 55-gallon metal drum. The generated waste was staged onsite at the terminal in a secure location. The generated waste will remain onsite for Dayton Freightâ€™s contracted hazardous waste vendor to coordinate disposal.

item.title: Report I-2024050058
item.description:
Report I-2024050058

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-23T15:12:17+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-15
  • City: Louisville
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: DHL EXPRESS (USA), INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On 05/15/2024 hidden dangerous goods were discovered during the shipment inspection process at the DHL Express SDF facility, located at 4607 Poplar Level Rd, Louisville, KY 40213. Transportation by road has been confirmed.
